sentence.Network_en: Investments in the U.S. money market have propped up the American dollar.
sentence.Network_cn: 对美国资金市场的投资扶持了美元。

sentence.Network_en: High rates of return can be earned on these investments.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些投资可能会有很高的回报率。

sentence.Network_en: Long-term stock market investments have produced superior returns compared with cash deposits.
sentence.Network_cn: 股票市场长期投资的收益比现金存款要高。

entry.def: Investment is the activity of investing money.

example.ex: He said the government must introduce tax incentives to encourage investment...
example.tran: 他说政府必须推出税收激励政策来鼓励投资。

example.ex: One of the most important changes concerns the investment of pension contributions.
example.tran: 最重要的一个变化涉及养老保险基金的投资。

entry.def: An investment is an amount of money that you invest, or the thing that you invest it in.

example.ex: You'll be able to earn an average rate of return of 8% on your investments.
example.tran: 你将能获得 8% 的平均投资收益率。

entry.tran: 有用的投资物;值得买的东西
entry.def: If you describe something you buy as an investment, you mean that it will be useful, especially because it will help you to do a task more cheaply or efficiently.

example.ex: When selecting boots, fine, quality leather will be a wise investment...
example.tran: 在挑选长筒靴的时候,购买上等的好皮靴将是明智的选择。

example.ex: A small-screen portable TV can be a good investment.
example.tran: 小屏幕的便携式电视机很值得买。

entry.def: Investment of time or effort is the spending of time or effort on something in order to make it a success.

example.ex: I worry about this big investment of time and effort.
example.tran: 我担心投入这么多时间与精力却不起作用。

Sentence.sentence: They lack the expertise to make capital investments.
In fact, by some estimates, the value of parental investments in children, investments of time and money (including lost wages), is equal to 20-30% of gross domestic product.
If these investments generate huge social benefits—as they clearly do—the benefits of providing more social support for the family should be that much clearer.
